panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together

targets.expr: (sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="node-exporter:9100",job="$job", mode!="idle"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="node-exporter:9100",job="$job"}[$__rate_interval])))) * 100

panels.title: CPU Usage
